thought: I need to configure the googleSheets read action to read from the specified document and sheet, to get the commercial data including Description.
plan: Set documentId mode to 'id' and value to the given Google Sheet ID.
Set sheetName mode to 'id' and value to 'commercial'.
Leave filtersUI and options as default empty dicts for reading all rows.
Test the reading action to ensure it returns the commercial entries.
criticism: Currently the googleSheets read action has no params, so it cannot function properly. Setting proper params is essential for the workflow to proceed.

tool_input.comments: Read all rows from the commercial sheet in the specified Google Sheet document.
TODO: Test reading data from Google Sheets.
Verify output contains commercial entries with Description field.
